data.eml:eml: Establishment of a new genus for Cyclograpsus lophopus Nobili, 1905, within Sesarmidae Dana, 1851 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Naruse, Tohru, Ng, Ngan Kee (2012): Establishment of a new genus for Cyclograpsus lophopus Nobili, 1905, within Sesarmidae Dana, 1851 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura). Zootaxa 3572: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213204
